channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Mary Berry - Love to Cook
channel.desc: Mary shares recipes that will build confidence in the kitchen, including a stir-fry hoisin chicken, a salmon and dill burger that even the most inexperienced cooks can master, and the secrets behind her best ginger biscuits. But she starts with a delectable Victoria sponge sandwich, filled with jam and topped with cream.
